request.description: Find a session.
Get session status. The status value is either `authenticated, connecting, connected, disconnecting` or `disconnected`.

urlencoded.description: Session id you want to use.
Client type. Value: 'true' (Normal WhatsApp Web / Legacy) or 'false' (Beta Multi-Device).
